content: Heaven and earth exhibit no benevolence; to them the ten thousand things are like straw dogs. The holy man exhibits no benevolence; to him the hundred families are like straw dogs. Is not the space between heaven and earth like unto a bellows? It is empty; yet it collapses not. It moves, and more and more comes forth.
translations: ita:Il cielo e la terra non mostrano alcuna benevolenza; per loro le diecimila cose sono come cani di paglia. L'uomo santo n
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by nonong (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
